 1	﻿using Microsoft.Extensions.Logging;
 2	using MCP.Server.Services;
 3	using MCP.Server.Models;
 4	using System.Diagnostics;
 5	
 6	namespace MCP.Tests;
 7	
 8	/// <summary>
 9	/// Performance and integration tests for the MCP server
 10	/// </summary>
 11	public class PerformanceAndIntegrationTests
 12	{
 13	 private readonly ILogger<RoslynAnalysisService> _logger;
 14	 private readonly string _testSolutionPath;
 15	
 16	 public PerformanceAndIntegrationTests()
 17	 {
 18	 var loggerFactory = LoggerFactory.Create(builder => builder.AddConsole());
 19	 _logger = loggerFactory.CreateLogger<RoslynAnalysisService>();
 20	
 21	 var testDataPath = Path.Combine(AppContext.BaseDirectory, "TestData", "TestSolution");
 22	 _testSolutionPath = Path.Combine(testDataPath, "TestSolution.sln");
 23	 }
 24	
 25	 [Test]
 26	 public async Task LoadSolution_Performance_CompletesWithinReasonableTime()
 27	 {
 28	 // Arrange
 29	 using var service = new RoslynAnalysisService(_logger);
 30	 var stopwatch = Stopwatch.StartNew();
 31	
 32	 // Act
 33	 var result = await service.LoadSolutionAsync(_testSolutionPath);
 34	 stopwatch.Stop();
 35	
 36	 // Assert
 37	 await Assert.That(result).IsTrue();
 38	 await Assert.That(stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds).IsLessThan(10000); // Should complete within 10 seconds
 39	
 40	 Console.WriteLine($"Solution loading took {stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds}ms");
 41	 }
 42	
 43	 [Test]
 44	 public async Task GetCompilationErrors_Performance_CompletesWithinReasonableTime()
 45	 {
 46	 // Arrange
 47	 using var service = new RoslynAnalysisService(_logger);
 48	 await service.LoadSolutionAsync(_testSolutionPath);
 49	
 50	 var stopwatch = Stopwatch.StartNew();
 51	
 52	 // Act
 53	 var errors = await service.GetCompilationErrorsAsync();
 54	 stopwatch.Stop();
 55	
 56	 // Assert
 57	 await Assert.That(errors).IsNotNull();
 58	 await Assert.That(stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds).IsLessThan(5000); // Should complete within 5 seconds
 59	
 60	 Console.WriteLine($"Error analysis took {stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds}ms for {errors.Count} errors");
 61	 }
 62	
 63	 [Test]
 64	 public async Task MultipleAnalysisCalls_Performance_SubsequentCallsAreFaster()
 65	 {
 66	 // Arrange
 67	 using var service = new RoslynAnalysisService(_logger);
 68	 await service.LoadSolutionAsync(_testSolutionPath);
 69	
 70	 // First call (may be slower due to initialization)
 71	 var stopwatch1 = Stopwatch.StartNew();
 72	 var errors1 = await service.GetCompilationErrorsAsync();
 73	 stopwatch1.Stop();
 74	
 75	 // Second call (should be faster due to caching)
 76	 var stopwatch2 = Stopwatch.StartNew();
 77	 var errors2 = await service.GetCompilationErrorsAsync();
 78	 stopwatch2.Stop();
 79	
 80	 // Assert
 81	 await Assert.That(errors1.Count).IsEqualTo(errors2.Count);
 82	 await Assert.That(stopwatch2.ElapsedMilliseconds).IsLessThanOrEqualTo(stopwatch1.ElapsedMilliseconds);
 83	
 84	 Console.WriteLine($"First call: {stopwatch1.ElapsedMilliseconds}ms, Second call: {stopwatch2.ElapsedMilliseconds}ms");
 85	 }
 86	
 87	 [Test]
 88	 public async Task ErrorDetails_Validation_ContainsExpectedInformation()
 89	 {
 90	 // Arrange
 91	 using var service = new RoslynAnalysisService(_logger);
 92	 await service.LoadSolutionAsync(_testSolutionPath);
 93	
 94	 // Act
 95	 var errors = await service.GetCompilationErrorsAsync();
 96	
 97	 // Assert
 98	 await Assert.That(errors).IsNotNull();
 99	 await Assert.That(errors.Count).IsGreaterThan(0);
 100	
 101	 // Validate error structure
 102	 foreach (var error in errors)
 103	 {
 104	 await Assert.That(error.Id).IsNotNull();
 105	 await Assert.That(error.Message).IsNotNull();
 106	 await Assert.That(error.FilePath).IsNotNull();
 107	 await Assert.That(error.StartLine).IsGreaterThan(0);
 108	 await Assert.That(error.StartColumn).IsGreaterThan(0);
 109	 await Assert.That(error.ProjectName).IsNotNull();
 110	
 111	 // Validate severity is a known value
 112	 var validSeverities = new[] { "Error", "Warning", "Info", "Hidden" };
 113	 await Assert.That(validSeverities).Contains(error.Severity.ToString());
 114	 }
 115	 }
 116	
 117	 [Test]
 118	 public async Task SpecificErrorTypes_Validation_ContainsExpectedErrors()
 119	 {
 120	 // Arrange
 121	 using var service = new RoslynAnalysisService(_logger);
 122	 await service.LoadSolutionAsync(_testSolutionPath);
 123	
 124	 // Act
 125	 var errors = await service.GetCompilationErrorsAsync();
 126	
 127	 // Assert - Check for specific errors we expect from our test files
 128	 var errorsByType = errors.GroupBy(e => e.Id).ToDictionary(g => g.Key, g => g.ToList());
 129	
 130	 // CS0103: The name 'undeclaredVariable' does not exist in the current context
 131	 await Assert.That(errorsByType.ContainsKey("CS0103")).IsTrue();
 132	 var cs0103Errors = errorsByType["CS0103"];
 133	 await Assert.That(cs0103Errors.Any(e => e.Message.Contains("undeclaredVariable"))).IsTrue();
 134	
 135	 // CS0246: The type or namespace name could not be found
 136	 await Assert.That(errorsByType.ContainsKey("CS0246")).IsTrue();
 137	 var cs0246Errors = errorsByType["CS0246"];
 138	 await Assert.That(cs0246Errors.Any(e => e.Message.Contains("UnknownType"))).IsTrue();
 139	
 140	 // CS0161: Not all code paths return a value
 141	 await Assert.That(errorsByType.ContainsKey("CS0161")).IsTrue();
 142	
 143	 // CS1002: Syntax error
 144	 await Assert.That(errorsByType.ContainsKey("CS1002")).IsTrue();
 145	 }
 146	
 147	 [Test]
 148	 public async Task ProjectStructure_Validation_CorrectlyIdentifiesProjects()
 149	 {
 150	 // Arrange
 151	 using var service = new RoslynAnalysisService(_logger);
 152	 await service.LoadSolutionAsync(_testSolutionPath);
 153	
 154	 // Act
 155	 var solutionInfo = await service.GetSolutionInfoAsync();
 156	
 157	 // Assert
 158	 await Assert.That(solutionInfo).IsNotNull();
 159	 await Assert.That(solutionInfo!.Projects.Count).IsEqualTo(2);
 160	
 161	 var testProject = solutionInfo.Projects.FirstOrDefault(p => p.Name == "TestProject");
 162	 var testLibrary = solutionInfo.Projects.FirstOrDefault(p => p.Name == "TestLibrary");
 163	
 164	 await Assert.That(testProject).IsNotNull();
 165	 await Assert.That(testLibrary).IsNotNull();
 166	
 167	 // Validate TestProject
 168	 await Assert.That(testProject!.OutputType).IsEqualTo("Exe");
 169	 await Assert.That(testProject.HasCompilationErrors).IsTrue();
 170	 await Assert.That(testProject.SourceFiles.Any(f => f.EndsWith("Program.cs"))).IsTrue();
 171	
 172	 // Validate TestLibrary
 173	 await Assert.That(testLibrary!.OutputType).IsEqualTo("Library");
 174	 await Assert.That(testLibrary.HasCompilationErrors).IsTrue();
 175	 await Assert.That(testLibrary.SourceFiles.Any(f => f.EndsWith("Calculator.cs"))).IsTrue();
 176	 await Assert.That(testLibrary.SourceFiles.Any(f => f.EndsWith("ValidClass.cs"))).IsTrue();
 177	 }
 178	
 179	 [Test]
 180	 public async Task FileAnalysis_Validation_IsolatesErrorsCorrectly()
 181	 {
 182	 // Arrange
 183	 using var service = new RoslynAnalysisService(_logger);
 184	 await service.LoadSolutionAsync(_testSolutionPath);
 185	
 186	 var programFilePath = Path.Combine(Path.GetDirectoryName(_testSolutionPath)!, "TestProject", "Program.cs");
 187	 var calculatorFilePath = Path.Combine(Path.GetDirectoryName(_testSolutionPath)!, "TestLibrary", "Calculator.cs");
 188	 var validClassFilePath = Path.Combine(Path.GetDirectoryName(_testSolutionPath)!, "TestLibrary", "ValidClass.cs");
 189	
 190	 // Act
 191	 var programErrors = await service.AnalyzeFileAsync(programFilePath);
 192	 var calculatorErrors = await service.AnalyzeFileAsync(calculatorFilePath);
 193	 var validClassErrors = await service.AnalyzeFileAsync(validClassFilePath);
 194	
 195	 // Assert
 196	 // Program.cs should have multiple errors
 197	 await Assert.That(programErrors.Count).IsGreaterThan(0);
 198	 await Assert.That(programErrors.All(e => e.FilePath.EndsWith("Program.cs"))).IsTrue();
 199	
 200	 // Calculator.cs should have at least one error (syntax error)
 201	 await Assert.That(calculatorErrors.Count).IsGreaterThan(0);
 202	 await Assert.That(calculatorErrors.All(e => e.FilePath.EndsWith("Calculator.cs"))).IsTrue();
 203	 await Assert.That(calculatorErrors.Any(e => e.Id == "CS1002")).IsTrue(); // Missing semicolon
 204	
 205	 // ValidClass.cs should have no errors
 206	 await Assert.That(validClassErrors.Count).IsEqualTo(0);
 207	 }
 208	
 209	 [Test]
 210	 public async Task MemoryUsage_Validation_DisposalCleansUpResources()
 211	 {
 212	 // Arrange
 213	 var initialMemory = GC.GetTotalMemory(true);
 214	
 215	 // Act
 216	 using (var service = new RoslynAnalysisService(_logger))
 217	 {
 218	 await service.LoadSolutionAsync(_testSolutionPath);
 219	 await service.GetCompilationErrorsAsync();
 220	 await service.GetSolutionInfoAsync();
 221	 }
 222	
 223	 // Force garbage collection
 224	 GC.Collect();
 225	 GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers();
 226	 GC.Collect();
 227	
 228	 var finalMemory = GC.GetTotalMemory(true);
 229	
 230	 // Assert
 231	 // Memory usage should not have increased dramatically
 232	 var memoryIncrease = finalMemory - initialMemory;
 233	 await Assert.That(memoryIncrease).IsLessThan(100_000_000); // Less than 100MB increase
 234	
 235	 Console.WriteLine($"Memory increase: {memoryIncrease / 1024 / 1024}MB");
 236	 }
 237	}

 2	using Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MSBuild;

 4	using MCP.Server.Models;
 5	using System.Collections.Immutable;
 6	
 7	namespace MCP.Server.Services;
 8	
 9	/// <summary>
 10	/// Service for performing Roslyn-based static analysis on .NET solutions and projects
 11	/// </summary>
 12	public class RoslynAnalysisService : IDisposable
 13	{
 14	 private readonly ILogger<RoslynAnalysisService> _logger;
 15	 private MSBuildWorkspace? _workspace;
 16	 private Solution? _currentSolution;
 17	
 18	 public RoslynAnalysisService(ILogger<RoslynAnalysisService> logger)
 19	 {
 20	 _logger = logger;
 21	 }
 22	
 23	 /// <summary>
 24	 /// Loads a solution file for analysis
 25	 /// </summary>
 26	 public async Task<bool> LoadSolutionAsync(string solutionPath)
 27	 {
 28	 try
 29	 {
 30	 _logger.LogInformation("Loading solution: {SolutionPath}", solutionPath);
 31	 
 32	 // Dispose existing workspace if any
 33	 _workspace?.Dispose();
 34	 
 35	 // Create new workspace
 36	 _workspace = MSBuildWorkspace.Create();
 37	 
 38	 // Load the solution
 39	 _currentSolution = await _workspace.OpenSolutionAsync(solutionPath);
 40	 
 41	 _logger.LogInformation("Successfully loaded solution with {ProjectCount} projects", 
 42	 _currentSolution.Projects.Count());
 43	 
 44	 return true;
 45	 }
 46	 catch (Exception ex)
 47	 {
 48	 _logger.LogError(ex, "Failed to load solution: {SolutionPath}", solutionPath);
 49	 return false;
 50	 }
